Hey! I’m Faioli, aka 0xttfx

After more than 25 years of experience, I think I’m an expert in IT infrastructure, Unix and Linux systems administrator, cloud computing, platform engineer, {S,N} RE, cyber security, geek and ğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸ hacker culture enthusiast

I also had the pleasure of being invited by the fearless friend @coffinix through the master @cybernetus to be a founding member (with the train already moving under the tracks…) of Area31 Hackerspace - Minas Gerais - Brazil ğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸

This blog is about me, unix, linux, infrastructure, cyber security, hacker culture and what I feel like talking about :)

Have fun at this place and get in touch if you want…
